Methods.Name: LocalStorage
Usage: var ls = PAGE.Constructors.LocalStorage (string parentName, object options)
Methods.Description: A normalized way of dealing with localStorage or cookie data as JSON formatted text. Each new instance represents a single property of the window.localStorage object. There are fallbacks in place for browsers that do not support local storage due to privacy restrictions such as Safari.

Definitions.parentName: The name of the window.localStorage property
Definitions.options.useCookie: Boolean value, forces system to use cookies instead of localStorage
Definitions.ls.addSaveProperty: Function (string name, string || object || boolean value, function callback); returns ls
Definitions.ls.deleteProperty: Function (string name, function callback); return ls

Methods.Name: ls.data
Usage: var ls = PAGE.Constructors.LocalStorage (string parentName, object options)
Methods.Description: Returns the key value pairs of all properties stored in the object. This is one level deeper than the window.localStorage object.

Methods.Name: ls.addSaveProperty
Usage: var ls = PAGE.Constructors.LocalStorage (string parentName, object options)
Examples:
var ls = PAGE.Constructors.LocalStorage("MySample")
undefined

ls.addSaveProperty("Demo123", "hello world")
object

ls.data.Demo123
"hello world"

Methods.Name: ls.deleteProperty
Usage: var ls = PAGE.Constructors.LocalStorage (string parentName, object options)
Examples:
ls.deleteProperty("Save1")
e {data: Object, name: "Example", cookie: undefined, saveAll: function, replaceAll: function…}

ls.data.Save1
undefined

Methods.Name: ls.loadAll
Usage: var ls = PAGE.Constructors.LocalStorage (string parentName, object options)
Methods.Description: Loads data from window.localStorage if there, or from cookie if fallback.

Methods.Name: ls.replaceAll
Usage: var ls = PAGE.Constructors.LocalStorage (string parentName, object options)
Methods.Description: Replaces everything in the object with the new properties

Methods.Name: ls.saveAll
Usage: var ls = PAGE.Constructors.LocalStorage (string parentName, object options)
Methods.Description: Updates the window.localStorage object based on the values in the ls.data objects.
